participant_2.background:
I've been single my whole life, but I'm hoping to find someone special one day.
I am proud of my discipline and commitment to my education, despite my sweet tooth.
I am not a fashion diva, but I like to take care of my appearance.
i am a professional horse racing handicapper.
I spent my last birthday working on a new project for my YouTube channel.

content.text: Hey how is it going today?
Pretty good! I'm working on a new project for my YouTube channel.
It's a horse racing channel. I handicap races and provide tips on how to bet.
Oh cool! I have never been to a horse race before.
You should go! They're a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! It sounds like something I would enjoy.
I do! I think they're beautiful creatures.
Me too! I love their grace and power.
What's your favorite breed of horse?
I love thoroughbreds. They're the fastest and most athletic breed.
I have heard that they are very expensive.
They can be, but there are also some affordable thoroughbreds available.
I might have to look into getting one.
I would love to see a picture of your horse if you get one!
I will definitely send you one
